Name: Tricks Magician
About the game: Tricks Magician is a game about a magician who has been trapped in an alternate reality because of his assistant rabbit's revenge, and now must overcome several challenges with a defying gravity and return to your normal world. Interesting mechanics related to magic Pixel art graphics Use the scenery to eliminate enemies 30 stages in the main campaign
